```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
fct_case_when <- function(...) {
  args <- as.list(match.call())
  levels <- sapply(args[-1], function(f) f[[3]])  # extract RHS of formula
  levels <- levels[!is.na(levels)]
  factor(dplyr::case_when(...), levels=levels)
}
```

Summarized by type: 

```{r}
all_2021_tree2shrub <- read_csv(here("processed-data", "xpp_2021_tree2shrub.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)

all_2014_tree2shrub <- read_csv(here("processed-data", "xpp_2014_tree2shrub.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(timing = time) %>% 
  select(-time, -trip) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  mutate(year = 2014) %>% 
  drop_na(type)

both_tree2shrub <- bind_rows(all_2014_tree2shrub, all_2021_tree2shrub) 

both_tree2shrub_wide <- both_tree2shrub %>% 
  select(-date) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "timing", 
              values_from = c("mpa_mean", "mpa_sd", "mpa_se"))
```

Summarized by spp: 

```{r}
all_2021_spp <- read_csv(here("processed-data", "xpp_2021_spp.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(species = spp) %>% 
  select(-spp)

all_2014_spp<- read_csv(here("processed-data", "xpp_2014_spp.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(timing = time) %>% 
  select(-time, -trip) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  mutate(year = 2014,
         )%>% 
  drop_na(type)

both_spp <- bind_rows(all_2014_spp, all_2021_spp) %>% 
  mutate(species = tolower(species))


both_spp_wide <- both_spp %>% 
  select(-date) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "timing", 
              values_from = c("mpa_mean", "mpa_sd", "mpa_se"))
```

Now visualize!

From Feb. 2023 meeting: Rate of change. Scattarplot of trees/shrubs with time and Predawnâ€“  How do shrub and tree slopes differ? Get 2014 we see a plunge and more gradual in 2021- but reach the same seasonal low.

```{r}
both_tree2shrub %>% 
  filter(timing == "predawn") %>% 
  drop_na(type) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = mpa_mean, 
             x = date, 
             color = type)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F) +
  geom_jitter()+
  facet_wrap(~year, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(y = "Predawn", 
       x = "Date")
```

```{r}
both_tree2shrub %>% 
  filter(timing == "midday") %>% 
  drop_na(type) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = mpa_mean, 
             x = date,

```
Hydroscapes: 

```{r}
both_tree2shrub_wide  %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = mpa_mean_predawn, 
             y = mpa_mean_midday, 
             color = type)) +
  geom_jitter()+
  facet_wrap(~type, scales = "free") +
  labs(x = "Predawn", 
       y = "Midday") +
  geom_abline()
  

both_spp_wide  %>%

             y = mpa_mean_midday, 
             color = type,

  geom_jitter()+

  geom_abline()
```
